SELECT top 99.999999 percent b.InvoiceRail+'_'+b.InvoiceCode as INVOICEID, '00' as INVOICE_TYPE, b.TaxNo+'_'+b.InvoiceCode as INVOICENO, f.BusinessName as INV_CLIENTNAME, b.remark as INVOICE_REMRAK, b.dates as INVOICE_DT, b.TaxAmount as TOTALSUMVALUE, d.Num as TOTALSUMQTY, 1 as impbatch, cast(e.billcode as varchar)+cast(c.RfBillSn as varchar) as SALEBILLID, cast(e.billcode as varchar)+cast(c.RfBillSn as varchar) as SALEBILLNO, j.goodscode as VEN_GOODS, j.goodsname as ven_goodsname, j.goodsspec as VEN_SPEC, j.manufacturer as VEN_PRODUCER, k.unit as VEN_UNIT, l.ProduceDate as PRDDATE, l.ValDate as ENDDATE, n.ApprovalNo as RATIFIER, k.unit as MSUNITNO, cast(n.ConvRatio as decimal(20,0)) as PACKNUM, m.num as BILLQTY, cast(m.price as decimal(20,2)) as PRICE, cast(m.taxprice*(1+(n.TAXRATE/100)) as decimal(20,2)) as PRC, cast(n.TAXRATE as decimal(20,2)) as TAXRATE , cast(m.taxamount*n.TAXRATE/100 as decimal(20,2)) as TAX, cast(m.amount as decimal(20,2)) as AMT, cast(m.taxamount*(1+(n.TAXRATE/100)) as decimal(20,2)) as SUMVALUE, cast(m.taxprice*(1+(n.TAXRATE/100)) as decimal(20,2)) as TRDPRC, cast(m.retailp as decimal(20,2)) as RTLPRC, b.billno as tmp_invoive_main_id, d.dnum as tmp_invoive_detail_rownum, cast(b.billno as varchar) +'_'+ cast(c.billsn as varchar) ven_invoice_detail_id
FROM InvoiceMt b left join Invoicedt c on c.billno=b.billno join businessdoc f on b.rfid = f.businessid and b.entid = f.entid join (select billno,sum(Num) as num,count(1) as dnum from Invoicedt group by billno ) d on d.billno=b.billno left join saleoutmt e on e.billno=c.rfbillno join goodsdoc j on j.goodsid=c.goodsid JOIN PGPrice k on c.goodsid=k.goodsid and c.packid=k.packid join batchcode l on l.angleid=c.angleid and l.goodsid=c.goodsid join goodsattr n on n.goodsid=c.goodsid left join saleoutdt m on m.billno=e.billno where b.rfid='C2FAFLE1V3Z' and b.billcode in
#{item}
group by b.InvoiceRail,b.InvoiceCode,b.TaxNo,f.BusinessName,b.remark,b.dates,b.TaxAmount,d.num, c.RfBillNo,c.RfBillSn,e.billcode,j.goodsname,j.goodsspec,j.manufacturer,k.unit,l.ProduceDate,l.ValDate, n.ApprovalNo,k.unit,c.meas,m.price,m.taxprice,n.TAXRATE,m.taxamount,m.amount,m.retailp,m.num,b.billno, c.billsn,d.dnum,j.goodscode
